title: The Elliott Smith Tribute CD (2004)
description:

The Elliott Smith Tribute CD came together over the year after Elliott SmithÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s death.  
These are the covers performed by musicians and fan in the year after Smith's passing, 
while anticipating the release of "From a Basement on the Hill."

These musicians have done the great favor of sharing their covers with you.  In return, 
they ask that you do them a small favor and DONATE at least FIVE DOLLARS to the ELLIOTT 
SMITH MEMORIAL FUND (http://www.sweetadeline.net/esmf.html).  The Elliott Smith Memorial 
Fund is a not-for-profit organization being established by Elliott's family for the sole 
purpose of providing financial support for children who are victims of abuse.  100% of
the funds go straight to Free Arts for Abused Children.

Please send your checks to:

Elliott Smith Memorial Fund
c/o Free Arts for Abused Children
11965 Venice Blvd. Suite 402
Los Angeles, CA 90066

* * CHECKS MUST BE MADE PAYABLE TO: * * 
"Elliott Smith Memorial Fund/Free Arts"


CREDITS:

All songs originally written by Elliott Smith.

Stars.

on the Hill,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ released by Anti- Records.

(Ã¢â‚¬Å“From a Basement on the HillÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ era) are unreleased.


SPECIAL THANKS GO OUT TO:
